screenshots.description: Initial Payroll settings view showing Settings menu navigation
Daily Wage Calculation section expanded showing table with three services: Salary proration, EOS leave encashment, and Unpaid leave deduction
Salary Proration configuration modal showing formula 'Basic salary + allowances / 30.45 days' and calculation method options
EOS Leave Encashment configuration modal showing formula and settings
Unpaid Leave Deduction configuration modal showing formula and divisor options
End of Service eligibility section header and Configure button in Payroll settings
EOS eligibility configuration modal showing eligible leave types with daily rates and override controls
Leave Policies settings page showing table of leave policies including 'Unpaid test' policy
Unpaid leave policy edit page showing Policy details and Leave allowance sections
Leave pay rate section showing unpaid leave daily wage calculation with disabled formula field indicating payroll override
Detailed view of unpaid leave daily wage calculation formula in Leave pay rate section
Leave pay rate section header showing expansion state and controls
